boardgame.name: DinoGenics
boardgame.description: DinoGenics is a competitive game for two to five players, in which each player attempts to build and run their own successful dinosaur park._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player is the head of their own corporation with access to their own private island resort. Each season, players assign agents to the mainland to compete over DNA and other limited resources. Once collected, players can build fences, various park facilities and populate their parks with dinosaurs. Parks with the most prestigious dinosaurs will attract the most visitors. But beware; if dinosaurs are neglected or improperly penned, they will attempt to escape and spread havoc through the entire park._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Use all the tools at your disposal; DNA splice mutant dinosaurs, exploit the Black Market or just try to run an honest park, the choices are yours._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Do you have what it takes to lead your corporation to victory?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

DinoGenics Kickstarter Park Manager pledge. Includes: * DinoGenics Board Game * All 15 stretch goals including the KS exclusive painted fences and Zombie T-Rex This is a pre-order. The game is slated for a Q4 2018 delivery. Payment for the game will be expected now with an additional payment for shipping as soon as it is delivered. I will do my best to ship this as economically as possible and will work with you to use whichever carrier you prefer. I will be happy to ship outside of the US, but know that the price for shipping internationally can be expensive. Again, I will do everything I can to ship this as economically as possible.

DinoGenics Kickstarter Park Manager pledge. Includes: DinoGenics Board Game All 15 stretch goals including the KS exclusive painted fences and Zombie T-Rex This is a pre-order. The game is slated for a Q4 2018 delivery. Description: DinoGenics is a competitive game for two to five players, in which each player attempts to build and run their own successful dinosaur park. Each player is the head of their own corporation with access to their own private island resort. Each season, players assign agents to the mainland to compete over DNA and other limited resources. Once collected, players can build fences, various park facilities and populate their parks with dinosaurs. Parks with the most prestigious dinosaurs will attract the most visitors. But beware; if dinosaurs are neglected or improperly penned, they will attempt to escape and spread havoc through the entire park. Use all the tools at your disposal; DNA splice mutant dinosaurs, exploit the Black Market or just try to run an honest park, the choices are yours. Do you have what it takes to lead your corporation to victory?

Including the add-on: Corrupted Trex Meeples. Very clean, complete, and as good as new. Played twice, and the cards have been sleeved while being used. Sleeves will be removed before packaging unless buyer pays extra for the sleeves. Will ship the same day or next day I receive the money. Payment also possible via Europe Swift (IBAN). Through PayPal (costs for the buyer).
